defaultItems.description: An elliptical machine provides a low-impact cardiovascular workout while engaging both the upper and lower body.
Stationary bikes offer a seated cardiovascular workout primarily targeting the lower body muscles.
A rowing machine provides a full-body cardiovascular workout while emphasizing the muscles in the back, arms, and legs.
The stair climber simulates climbing stairs and provides an intense lower body workout while also engaging the cardiovascular system.
The leg press machine targets the muscles of the lower body, including the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
The chest press machine is a strength training equipment that primarily targets the muscles of the chest (pectoralis major), shoulders (anterior deltoids), and triceps.
The lat pulldown machine is designed to strengthen the muscles of the upper back, particularly the latissimus dorsi (lats), as well as the biceps and forearms.
The cable crossover machine is a versatile piece of equipment for targeting various muscles in the upper body, including the chest, shoulders, and arms.
The Smith machine is a versatile piece of equipment that allows for a wide range of exercises targeting various muscle groups, including chest, shoulders, legs, and more.
The basketball court is a sports surface designed for playing basketball, typically consisting of a rectangular floor with a hoop at each end.
An indoor track is a circular or oval-shaped track located inside a building, used primarily for running and other track and field events.
A treadmill is a cardio machine used for walking, running, or climbing while remaining in the same place.
Dumbbells are free weights used in strength training, typically consisting of a handle with weights attached at each end.
Yoga mats are used for yoga, Pilates, and other floor exercises to provide cushioning and traction.
The bench press is a strength training exercise that works the chest, shoulders, and triceps using a barbell or dumbbells.
Yoga blocks are used to provide support and stability in yoga poses, helping to improve flexibility and alignment.
A foam roller is a self-massage tool used to release muscle tightness and improve flexibility and range of motion.
A stretching strap is used to assist in stretching exercises, helping to increase flexibility and improve range of motion.
A Pilates ring, also known as a magic circle, is a flexible ring used in Pilates exercises to add resistance and improve flexibility and muscle tone.
A balance ball, also known as a stability ball, is used for stability, balance, and flexibility exercises to improve core strength and posture.
Resistance bands are elastic bands used for stretching, strengthening, and flexibility exercises to target various muscle groups.
Kettlebells are cast iron weights with a handle used for ballistic exercises that combine cardiovascular, strength, and flexibility training.
Battle ropes are thick, heavy ropes that are anchored and used in high-intensity interval training (HIIT) and other workouts to improve cardiovascular endurance and strength.
A boxing punching bag is used for cardiovascular workouts, endurance training, and improving boxing or martial arts techniques.
Medicine balls are weighted balls used for strength training, plyometrics, and rehabilitation exercises, improving core strength, coordination, and explosive power.
The TRX suspension trainer uses gravity and bodyweight exercises to develop strength, balance, flexibility, and core stability.
A jump rope is a simple and effective cardio tool for improving coordination, agility, and cardiovascular health.
A plyometric box is used for plyometric exercises, such as box jumps and step-ups, to improve power, speed, and explosiveness.
A sled push is a functional strength training exercise where the user pushes a weighted sled to develop lower body strength, power, and endurance.
Glider discs are used to perform exercises that engage multiple muscle groups, improve stability, and enhance flexibility, particularly in core and lower body muscles.
An agility ladder is used for footwork drills and agility training, improving coordination, speed, and agility for athletes and fitness enthusiasts.
An ab roller wheel is a compact fitness tool used for core strengthening exercises, targeting the abdominals, obliques, and lower back muscles.
Resistance loop bands are small, portable bands used for strength training, rehabilitation, and flexibility exercises to target specific muscle groups.
A power tower is a multi-functional piece of equipment for bodyweight exercises like pull-ups, dips, and leg raises, targeting various muscle groups.
A squat rack is used for performing squats, bench presses, and other barbell exercises, providing safety and stability during heavy lifting.
A landmine attachment is a versatile tool for performing rotational exercises, presses, and rows, adding variety to strength training workouts.
An assault bike is a stationary exercise bike with fan blades for resistance, providing a high-intensity cardiovascular workout for both upper and lower body.
A glute-ham developer is used for strengthening the posterior chain muscles, including the glutes, hamstrings, and lower back.
An agility cone set is used for agility drills, speed training, and footwork exercises to improve athletic performance and coordination.
The leg extension machine isolates and strengthens the quadriceps muscles through controlled leg extension movements.
The seated leg curl machine targets the hamstrings, promoting knee flexion against resistance for strength and muscle development.
The tricep rope attachment is used for various tricep exercises on cable machines, targeting the muscles of the upper arm.
The close grip row handle is designed for rowing exercises, focusing on the back muscles, including the latissimus dorsi and rhomboids.
The V-bar attachment is commonly used for cable exercises like rows and pulldowns, targeting the back and arm muscles.
The cable ankle strap attaches to cable machines for lower body exercises, such as leg lifts, hip abductions, and kickbacks.
A basketball for playing basketball games on the court. Suitable for individual practice or team games.
A soccer ball for playing soccer matches or practice. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
A volleyball for playing volleyball games on the court. Suitable for casual games or competitive matches.

defaultWorkouts.highlight: Hit a new pr to on squat 395 for 3
defaultWorkouts.name: Squat Day

defaultWorkouts.highlight: Feeling more confident on deadlift hitting 435 for 4
defaultWorkouts.name: Deadlift Day
